about_the_game:
Star System Set: Salutian (FULL SET)

SALUTIAN STAR SYSTEM SET by Michael O. Holland
The jungle planet of Mien is home to danger, mystery, and some of the galaxy's finest starship foundries. Monsters prowl the jungle floors while silver cities seems to float among the canopy. And all across the wildlands, the sound of finely tuned engines roaring into the sky echoes over an alien landscape . For the locals consider it a sacred duty to explore the galaxy , q uesting endlessley after their lost g oddess, Maltur .
  • Alien Race : The Lamerta
  • P lanet : Mien
  • M onsters : Grunk Worm and Axarak
  • C haracter O ptions : Lawman Theme and New Spells
  • E quipment : Lamerta Ship Styles & Gear
  • Mini -A dventure : Welcome to the Jungle
S tar System Sets offer new planets to explore, dangers to overcome, lifeforms to study, and cultures to document. Modular enough for any campaign, each double-sided card presents a complete ruleset for ease of reference, allowing GMs to fill in the blank spots on their star charts.
Card types include Race, Planet, Charact er Options, Equipment , Monsters, and Mini-Adventure. Each set is available ? la carte or as a six-card bundle.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Robin Wischnewski

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and a one time purchase of the Starfinder ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded and if you are running Fantasy Grounds or Fantasy Grounds Unity.
detailed_description:
Star System Set: Salutian (FULL SET)

SALUTIAN STAR SYSTEM SET by Michael O. Holland
The jungle planet of Mien is home to danger, mystery, and some of the galaxy's finest starship foundries. Monsters prowl the jungle floors while silver cities seems to float among the canopy. And all across the wildlands, the sound of finely tuned engines roaring into the sky echoes over an alien landscape . For the locals consider it a sacred duty to explore the galaxy , q uesting endlessley after their lost g oddess, Maltur .
  • Alien Race : The Lamerta
  • P lanet : Mien
  • M onsters : Grunk Worm and Axarak
  • C haracter O ptions : Lawman Theme and New Spells
  • E quipment : Lamerta Ship Styles & Gear
  • Mini -A dventure : Welcome to the Jungle
S tar System Sets offer new planets to explore, dangers to overcome, lifeforms to study, and cultures to document. Modular enough for any campaign, each double-sided card presents a complete ruleset for ease of reference, allowing GMs to fill in the blank spots on their star charts.
Card types include Race, Planet, Charact er Options, Equipment , Monsters, and Mini-Adventure. Each set is available ? la carte or as a six-card bundle.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Robin Wischnewski

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and a one time purchase of the Starfinder ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded and if you are running Fantasy Grounds or Fantasy Grounds Unity.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
